net.hudup.listener

Class HttpUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.listener.HttpUtil

  • public class HttpUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class provides utility methods for operators relevant to HTTP protocol such as processing HTTP request/response and creating HTTP header. Note, HTTP, which is the abbreviation of Hypertext Transfer Protocol, is the popular network protocol.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen

    • Method Detail

      • getParameters

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getParameters(java.lang.String requestText)
        Extracting parameters from the specified request in text form. Such parameters are stored in the returned map.
        Parameters:
        requestText - specified request in text form.
        Returns:
        map of parameters. Header of an sample request in text form "http://www.hudup.net/project/recommend?parameter1=value1&parameter2=value2" is shown as follow:

        GET /project/recommend?parameter1=value1&parameter2=value2 HTTP/1.1
        Host: www.hudup.net

        In this example, this method will returns the map having two entries: (parameter1, value1) and (parameter2, value2).

      • getAction

        public static java.lang.String getAction(java.lang.String requestText)
        Getting the action of specified request in text form.
        Parameters:
        requestText - specified request in text form.
        Returns:
        action of specified request in text form. Header of an sample request in text form "http://www.hudup.net/project/recommend?parameter1=value1&parameter2=value2" is shown as follow:

        GET /project/recommend?parameter1=value1&parameter2=value2 HTTP/1.1
        Host: www.hudup.net

        In this example, the action returned by this method is "recommend".

      • getPath

        public static java.lang.String getPath(java.lang.String requestText)
        Getting the path of specified request in text form.
        Parameters:
        requestText - specified request in text form.
        Returns:
        path of specified request in text form. Header of an sample request in text form "http://www.hudup.net/project/recommend?parameter1=value1&parameter2=value2" is shown as follow:

        GET /project/recommend?parameter1=value1&parameter2=value2 HTTP/1.1
        Host: www.hudup.net

        In this example, the path return by this method is "project/recommend".

      • getContent

        public static java.lang.String getContent(java.lang.String requestText)
        Getting the content of specified request in text form.
        Parameters:
        requestText - specified request in text form.
        Returns:
        content of specified request in text form. Header of an sample request in text form "http://www.hudup.net/project/recommend?parameter1=value1&parameter2=value2" is shown as follow:

        GET /project/recommend?parameter1=value1&parameter2=value2 HTTP/1.1
        Host: www.hudup.net

        In this example, the content returned by this method is "/project/recommend?parameter1=value1&parameter2=value2".

      • createResponseHeader

        public static java.lang.String createResponseHeader(int return_code,
                                                    int file_type)
        Creating the HTTP header of the response for the previous request.
        Parameters:
        return_code - specified returned code such as 200 (successful response), 400 (bad request), 403 (forbidden), 404 (not found), 500 (Internal Server Error), 501 (not implemented).
        file_type - type of the file which is returned to client, for example: application/json, text/html, image/jpeg, image/gif, text/plain, application/x-zip-compressed.
        Returns:
        HTTP header of the response. Following is an example of response header:

        HTTP/1.0 200 OK
        Connection: close
        Server: Hudup listener v6
        Content-Type: application/json

      • getFileType

        public static int getFileType(java.lang.String requestText)
        Getting the file type inside the request in text form.
        Parameters:
        requestText - specified request in text form.
        Returns:
        file type inside the request in text form. Header of an sample request in text form "http://www.hudup.net/project/recommend/recommended-list.json" is shown as follow:

        GET /project/recommend/recommended-list.json HTTP/1.1
        Host: www.hudup.net

        In this example, the file type returned by this method "json".
